src:
Lawan Bournemouth, MU tanpa Harry Maguire, Victor Lindelof dan Marcus Rashford?
01 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar buruk datang bagi Manchester United. Tiga penggawa mereka, Harry Maguire, Victor Lindelof dan Marcus Rashford berpotensi absen di laga melawan Bournemouth.
Manchester United akan melakoni laga tandang pada hari Sabtu (2/11) besok. Mereka akan menghadapi Bournemouth pada pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL.
Pada tengah pekan kemarin, dua pemain United Marcus Rashford dan Harry Maguire menunjukkan gejala cedera. Rashford terlihat mengompres lututnya sementara Maguire terlihat berjalan pincang seusai laga. Lindelof juga terlihat mendapatkan benturan di akhir laga.
Solskjaer sendiri belum bisa memastikan apakah ketiga pemain itu bisa bermain di laga tersebut. "Saat ini masih terlalu dini untuk menentukan mereka bisa bermain atau tidak," ujar Solskjaer di situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Opponent Bournemouth, MU without Harry Maguire, Victor Lindelof and Marcus Rashford?
Nov 01 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A bad news comes for Manchester United. Three of their employees, Harry Maguire, Victor Lindelof and Marcus Rashford, could potentially miss the match against Bournemouth.
Manchester United will play away on Saturday (2/11) tomorrow. They will face Bournemouth in Week 11 of the EPL match.
In the middle of last week, two United players Marcus Rashford and Harry Maguire showed symptoms of injury. Rashford was seen compressing his knee while Maguire was seen limping after the game. Lindelof was also seen getting hit at the end of the fight.
Solskjaer himself could not confirm whether the three players could play in the match. "It is still too early to determine whether they can play or not," Solskjaer said on the official Manchester United website.
